game.name: A Memoir Blue
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 오래 전 노래가 수영 챔피언 미리암에게 수많은 추억을 불러 일으킵니다. 헌신적인 어머니와 보냈던 힘겨운 어린 시절과 둘의 복잡한 관계를 다루는 감성적인 여행을 떠나보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A song from years ago triggers a flood of memories for champion swimmer Miriam. Embark on an evocative journey through her turbulent childhood and the complicated relationship she shared with her devoted mother.

reviewHighlights.text: Very very short game with a nice oniric and nostalgic vibes and ost that fit nicely with it. Enjoyed the moment i had.
Felt like an early phone or wii game where you just watch and swipe sometimes. Story was engaging, but I'd rather just watch it instead of "play" it.
